required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of HSK3486 in the Induction of General Anesthesia
clinical_study.official_title: A Multi-center, Randomized, Single-blind, Propofol Injectable Emulsion Parallel-controlled Phase III Clinical Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of HSK3486 Injectable Emulsion in the Induction of General Anesthesia in Patients Undergoing Elective Surgery

brief_summary.textblock: This is a multi-center, randomized, single-blind, propofol injectable emulsion parallel-controlled Phase III clinical study. A total of patients undergoing elective surgery are intended to be enrolled and randomly assigned to HSK3486 group and propofol group in a 2:1 ratio.

primary_outcome.time_frame: During maintenance of general anesthesia on day 1
primary_outcome.description: During the maintenance of anesthesia, the subject is not recovered and no remedial anesthetic is used

primary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with adverse events

secondary_outcome.time_frame: During induction of general anesthesia on day 1
secondary_outcome.description: During the induction of anesthesia, the subject achieves successful induction (i.e., MOAA/S ≤ 1) after administration of the study drug (up to 2 top-up doses), and no remedial anesthetic is used.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of time from the beginning of surgical skin incision to the end of surgery
secondary_outcome.time_frame: During maintenance of general anesthesia on day 1
A period of time from discontinuation of the study drug to recovery after the end of surgery on day 1
secondary_outcome.description: 3 consecutive MOAA/S = 5. Record the time when MOAA/S = 5 is reached for the first time.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: A period of time from discontinuation of the study drug to respiratory recovery after the end of surgery on day 1
secondary_outcome.description: Respiratory rate ≥ 8 breaths/min and the tidal volume ≥ 5 mL/kg

secondary_outcome.measure: Time from discontinuation of the study drug to 3 consecutive Aldrete score ≥ 9.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: A period of time from discontinuation of the study drug to 3 consecutive Aldrete score ≥ 9 on day 1

clinical_study.condition: Induction and Maintenance of General Anesthesia

intervention.description: The initial Induction dose of HSK3486 is 0.4 mg/kg. The initial maintenance dose of HSK3486 is 0.8 mg/kg/h
The initial Induction dose of propofol is 2.0 mg/kg. The initial maintenance dose of propofol is 5.0 mg/kg/h
